sentence.Network_en: Objective: To characterize the clinical features and the treatment of photosensitivity dermatitis induced by thiazine diuretics.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 探讨噻嗪类利尿药引起光敏性皮炎的临床特点及治疗.

sentence.Network_en: Methods: The data from 28 patients with photosensitivity dermatitis induced by thiazine diuretics were analyzed retrospectively.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法: 对噻嗪类利尿药引起外源性光敏性皮炎28例进行回顾性分析.
